thread.section_title: Oililyworld.com Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Oililyworld.com | oililyworld.com
thread.title: Vera

author: Vera
title: Vera
text:
I am very pleased with the quality of the clothes and bags I purchased: nice rabrics, good finishings and very comfortable. Also, the shipping was quick and tracked, no issues whatsoever with packaging either.
Beware though that in my opiniom the clothes are a bit larger than usual. It would be excellent if a more precise size chart would be available. The items I bought in my usual size are a bit larger than expected but fit well after minimal tailoring.
